title: 82/689/EEC: Commission Decision of 27 September 1982 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Spectra Physics - High-Power Single-Frequency Dye Laser, model 380 A' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 27 September 1982
establishing that the apparatus described as 'Spectra Physics - High-Power Single-Frequency Dye Laser, model 380 A' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(82/689/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'Spectra Physics - High-Power Single-Frequency Dye Laser, model 380 A', which is the subject of an application by Italy of 25 February 1982, may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 September 1982.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
